Text: You did a great job on these rips except for one thing. You cut out the music on every game. I would've rather downloaded a larger torrent that were identical to the original game.
Good if you just leave out tm 1+2 cause that's not necessary. also tm 3

Is the music actually cut out or did "audessy" just forget to enable sound?

From the filesize, my guess would be the latter, but it's hard to tell.

Also: are these NTSC or PAL? Thank you.

im most likely just cyberly retarded but i can not get these damn games to work! i extracted it with that 7zip thing and i downloaded ur emulater and all it does is show a small window.. the game is just a .bin file and i cant open it... wtf am i doing wrong? someone please help me before i throw my laptop across a room :(

As someone else stated, this torrent DOES have every one of the Playstation 1 Twisted Metal titles...  But unfortunately, the games' digital audio soundtrack -- a HUGE part of the gameplay experience, in my opinion -- is missing from every game that uses Redbook audio. (Which is apparently every game.)  That's extremely disappointing...
